refnamediv.refpurpose: Get a list value from a list.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
list
The previously created list that is to be used with this request.
index
The numeric index (0 based) of the item in the list to be retrieved.
value
The list value to be returned. Note that this argument is passed by reference and any existing value will be overwritten.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
This function returns an integer response code. GETDNS_RETURN_GOOD indicates successful completion.
